meanings.definition: People who do not use something.
meanings.sent1: The library offers special programs to attract nonusers.
meanings.sent2: The nonusers of the new app are missing out on its benefits.
meanings.sent3: The nonusers at the party were surprised by the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent4: In the land of technology, nonusers are like fish out of water.
meanings.sent5: The nonusers in the study group struggled to understand the material.

meanings.definition: Those who refrain from using a particular product or service.
meanings.sent1: The company conducted a survey to understand the needs of nonusers.
meanings.sent2: Nonusers of the premium membership can still access basic features.
meanings.sent3: The nonusers of the new restaurant missed out on the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: To the nonusers, the exclusive club seemed like a mysterious place.
meanings.sent5: The nonusers of the fitness class were hesitant to join in.
